full_text: CHASE MANHATTAN roadway 12, New York July 9th 1962 New York Domingo Honorable Consul General of the United States in the Dominican Republic: AFFIDAVIT Honorable Consul; I, hereby respectfully request of you, to conce de, a permanent visa to my aunt Mrs. Ana Dolores Moronta. I Gloria Mercedes Moronta american citizen, with inscription number 8400128, swear, that my aunt will ever 1098 be of public charge to the United States government. of July I hereby make constant that I have a six rooms apartment in which my aunt will recide with me, located at 37- 62 101rst Street Corona 68, N. Y. on which I pay a rent of $100. a month. That I am employ by Durlacher & Company, loca- ted at 120 E. 23rd. Street New York 10, N. Y. and my salary is that of $90.00 Per week. Sequed this 7/11/62 I hereby gratefully thank you Any Notary IRVING POKRASSA Public, State of New York No. 30-8397400 Qualified in Wassau County Commission Expires March 30, 196 4 gloria mercedommenta Gloria Mercedes Moronta
